properties.entry: SELECT COM_NO , RV_NO , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , COM_CONTENT , COM_ENROLL_DATE , COM_MODIFY_DATE , COM_PARENT_NO , COM_STATUS FROM TB_COMMENT WHERE RV_NO=? ORDER BY COM_NO ASC

INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT ( COM_NO , RV_NO , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , COM_CONTENT , COM_ENROLL_DATE , COM_MODIFY_DATE , COM_PARENT_NO , COM_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ( SELECT MEM_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ? ) , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 0 , 'Y' )
